full_summary:
**Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) - Vertical Wind Tunnel Training Facility**
=====================================

**Procurement Details**
--------------------

*   **RFSA Reference Number**: PW-23-01024255
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Solicitation Number**: W6399-22-LK42/B
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-02-01
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-02-22T14:00:00

**Procurement Overview**
----------------------

The Department of National Defence invites qualified service providers to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) for the provision of a Vertical Wind Tunnel (VWT) training facility.

**Services Required**
-----------------

The services required include:

*   Providing a qualified resource and instructor to support the provision of VWT training facility to Canadian Armed Forces members
*   Conducting freefall parachuting simulation training

**Additional Information**
----------------------

*   The Standing Offer (SO) will be used to fulfill the Department’s requirement for the provision of VWT training facility.
*   The SO will remain in effect for a period of one (1) year from the date of issuance.
*   Service providers are required to have the necessary resources, instructor, and personnel to support the provision of VWT training facility.
*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on procurement.
*   Bidders may submit their documents in either official language of Canada.

**Attachments**
--------------

*   [RFSA English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/01/7b48ff6d3fa8d93378d3762e38b95ba2/rfso_-_w6399-22-lk42_b_-_rfso_vwt_english.pdf)
*   [RFSA French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/01/e6ca968fbf7b725e4528636fb7b30092/rfso_-_w6399-22-lk42_b_-_rfso_vwt_french.pdf)

**Contact Information**
-------------------

*   **Contact Name**: Sanford, Austin
*   **Email**: Austin.Sanford@forces.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: Not provided

**Regions of Opportunity**
-----------------------

*   Canada
*   United States
